name: GooCubelets: RGB
description:
The first independent GooCubelets!

This game takes you through 30 puzzle levels designed by new level designers and based on three colors - RED, GREEN and BLUE.

As far as levels are concerned - they are as tricky and puzzley as always. With cubes, goals, multiple controlled cubes and traps.

It is a very proud first installment in the Independent GooCubelets series.
